attributes.action: ensure that the full force of the law be used to prosecute any members of parliament who have not declared a “benefit in kind” for items which have been claimed as expenses but are not essential for their duties as a member of parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am concerned that the full force of the law be used to make sure that MP's are treated like the rest of us tax payers. They must be subjected to a tax investigation and prosecution if they have not declared a benefit in kind,that they may have recieved by way of an expenses claim, just as we would be. If this course is not followed it will be a green light for the rest of us to do the same and be treated likewise.

rejection.details: Government does not prosecute people - it is a matter for the police and CPS.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
